message: Isn't that roughly the same as newTwitter though?
I follow too many interesting people :/
right now if your browser width is below 990px things visually break.. thats pretty wide for a window I want open all the time (but don't want taking all my screen real-estate)

I stopped using T for Mac altogether. But, that's my usage style for ya. I deliberately only go into Twitter when I have time for it (or choose to make time), and then I close it and not have it distract me by being open in the background.
sure, but I don't leave new twitter open, I use the twitter app for mac that takes up like 370px
I'd like to move from using propane (campfire) to using convore, but my propane window is much smaller: http://cl.ly/1a121J2g1d0q0B2M2Z08
